mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents}, WRITER=#{writer} WHERE BOOKNUMBER=#{num};
mapper.insert: insert into notice (num, writer, title, contents, regDate, hit) values (notice_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum R, B.* FROM (SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE NUM>0 ORDER BY NUM DESC) B) WHERE R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
